items.title: Learn  SQL For Oracle Databases - Using Toad From Scratch
items.headline: Learn how to communicate with oracle databases using Toad for Oracle . Learn how to create,read,update and delete data.
objectives_summary: After taking this course you will be able to communicate with an oracle database to create,read,update and delete data from a database. This course will teach you how to write your own SOL queries that will enable you communicate and get data from an oracle database using Toad for oracle editor as an interface.
